import React, { Fagment } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MDBCard, MDBCardHeader, MDBCardImage, MDBIcon } from 'mdbreact'; const MovieListCardItem = (props) => { const { movie } = props; return ( <>

) } export default MovieListCardItem;
